relation: 1. Posted: Sat 22nd Dec 2012 22:38 GMT I just got Mario Tennis as well for the 3DS. Is there a way to play cooperatively with a friend against CPU's or other players in the Online/Internet multiplayer portion of the game? I am not seeing the option. Site
